summary: Completed comprehensive testing of PriceHive collaborative supermarket pricing app with Google OAuth, alerts system, gamification, and analytics features. Backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate). Frontend core functionality working with minor session management issue.

integration_issues.issue: Sessions expire quickly causing redirects to login when navigating between pages

passed_tests: Backend API Tests (29/29 passed - 100% success rate)
New Features API Tests (16/16 passed - 100% success rate)
Landing page loads with PriceHive branding
Google OAuth button present ('Empezar con Google')
Login page with Google OAuth and email/password options
Dashboard shows user points (8 points with star icon)
Complete navigation menu (Dashboard, Muro, Lista de Compra, Análisis, Alertas, Admin)
Dashboard statistics display (3 Productos, 2 Precios, 4 Supermercados, 8 Usuarios)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix session management - sessions are expiring too quickly causing users to be redirected to login when navigating between pages. This affects user experience when trying to access /analytics and /profile pages. Consider adjusting session timeout or cookie settings.
